Kn es er y Starke Approximation in algebraischen Gruppen,  I 203
[ 14 ] M.  Knesety Schwache Approximation in algebraischen Gruppen,  Coll.  Théorie des Groupes Algébriques,  Bruxelles 1962. 
[ 15 ] M,  Kneser,  Einfach zusammenhängende algebraische Gruppen in der Arithmetik,  Int.  Gong.  Math. , Stock holm 1962. 
[ 16 ] P.  J.  Lamont,  Approximation theorems for the group G ^. Indagationes Mathematicae 26 ( 1964 ), 187—191. 
[ 17 ] S.  Lang,  Algebraic groups over finite fields.  Amer.  J.  of Math.  78 ( 1956 ), 555—563. 
[ 18 ] T.  Ono,  On the relative theory of Tamagawa numbers.  Erscheint in den Annals of Mathematics. 
[ 19 ] A.  Ostrowski,  Über algebraische Funktionen von Dirichletschen Reihen,  Math.  Zeitschr.  37 ( 1933 ), 98—133. 
[ 20 ] J. - P.  Serre,  Cohomologie galoisienne des groupes algébriques linéaires.  Coll.  Théorie des Groupes Algébri ques,  Bruxelles 1962. 
[ 21 ] G,  Shimura,  Arithmetic of unitary groups.  Annals of Math.  79 ( 1964 ), 369—409. 
[ 22 ] B.  Steinberg,  Variations on a theme of Chevalley,  Pacific J.  of Math.  9 ( 1959 ), 875—891. 
[ 23 ] R.  Steinberg,  The simplicity of certain groups.  Pacific J.  of Math.  10 ( 1960 ), 1039—1041. 
[ 24 ] A.  Wdl,  Adeles and algebraic groups.  Institute for Advanced Study,  Princeton 1961. 
[ 25 ] A.  Weil,  Algebras with involutions and the classical groups,  J.  Ind.  Math.  Soc,  24 ( 1961 ), 589—623. 
Eingegangen 28.  Juni 1964
